<i>Le 16 juillet 1945,</i>
<i>dans les montagnes de Los
Alamos, au Nouveau Mexique,</i>
<i>a explosé la première bombe atomique.</i>
<i>Une lueur blanche a percé le
ciel avec tant d'intensité,</i>
<i>qu'une fille aveugle a déclaré avoir
vu le flash à plus de 100 km de là.</i>
<i>Après avoir été témoin de l'explosion,</i>
<i>J. Robert Oppenheimer cita
un passage du Bhagavad Gita,</i>
<i>et déclara "Je suis devenu la
mort, le destructeur des mondes."</i>
<i>Son collègue, Ken Bainbridge,</i>
<i>l'exprima différemment, quand il se
pencha vers Oppenheimer et chuchota</i>
<i>"maintenant, nous sommes
tous des fils de pute."</i>

Sous-titres réalisés par La Bloc Team</i>

Synchronisé par jayson.sosweet & Job22</i>

Pour www.forom.com</i>
<i>Maintenant nous sommes
tous des fils de pute.</i>
<i>In the future,</i>
<i>my son will lead mankind
in a war against Skynet,</i>
<i>a computer system programmed
to destroy the world.</i>
<i>It has sent machines
back through time...</i>
<i>some to kill him...</i>
<i>one to protect him.</i>
<i>Today we fight to stop Skynet
from ever being created.</i>
<i>To change our future.</i>
<i>To change his fate.</i>
<i>The war to save mankind begins now.</i>

<i>On july 16th, 1945,</i>
<i>in the mountains outside
of Los Alamos, New Mexico,</i>
<i>the world's first atomic bomb exploded.</i>
<i>A white light pierced the sky
with such intensity</i>
<i>that a blind girl claimed to see
the flash from a hundred miles away.</i>
<i>After witnessing the explosion,</i>
<i>J. Robert Oppenheimer quoted a fragment</i>
<i>of the Bhagavad Ga, declaring,</i>
<i>"I am become death,</i>
<i>the destroyer of worlds."</i>
<i>His colleague, Ken Bainbridge,</i>
<i>put it another way when
he leaned close to Oppenheimer</i>
<i>and whispered,</i>
<i>"Now we are all sons of bitches."</i>
<i>Now we are all sons of bitches.</i>

en guerre contre Skynet,</i>

programmé pour détruire le monde.</i>

ŕ travers le temps...</i>

pour empęcher la création de Skynet.</i>

<i>If there is a flaw in chess
as a game of war,</i>
<i>it is this:</i>
<i>unlike war,</i>
<i>the rules of chess are constant.</i>
<i>The pieces unchangeable.</i>
<i>You will never win the heart
of a rook or the mind of a knight.</i>
<i>They are deaf to your arguments.</i>
<i>And so be it.</i>
<i>The goal of a chess game
is total annihilation.</i>
<i>But, in war, even as the blood
beats in your ears</i>
<i>and you race after your enemy,</i>
<i>there is the hope that saner minds
than yours will stop you</i>
<i>before you reach your target.</i>
<i>In war,</i>
<i>unlike chess, rules can be changed.</i>
<i>Truces can be called.</i>
<i>The greatest of enemies
can become the best of friends.</i>

Derek.

<i>Maintenant la science

<i>In the future,
a computer program called Skynet</i>
<i>will declare war on the human race.</i>
<i>Machines has traveled back in time</i>
<i>taking human form
to terminate John Connor,</i>
<i>the future leader of the resistance.</i>
<i>Sarah Connor, John's mother,</i>
<i>teacher and protector.</i>
<i>Cameron, a Terminator reprogramed</i>
<i>to defend them at all costs.</i>
<i>Derek Reese, John's uncle</i>
<i>and a commanding officer
with the resistance.</i>
<i>Together, they fight to stop Skynet
from ever being created.</i>
<i>The battle for our tomorrow
starts today.</i>

<i>Juste un exercice.</i>
Après ce tragique accident,
les propriétaires de Serrano Point
et de six autres centrales du pays
ont conclu un partenariat
avec ma société,
Automyte Systems.
Nous avons développé
une nouvelle automatisation
qui sera installée
dans les salles de contrôle.
Ces machines sophistiquées
élimineront la possibilité
d'erreur humaine
et empêcheront un désastre majeur.
<i>In the future,
a computer program called Skynet</i>
<i>will declare war on the human race.</i>
<i>Machines has traveled back in time</i>
<i>taking human form
to terminate John Connor,</i>
<i>the future leader of the resistance.</i>
<i>Sarah Connor, John's mother,</i>
<i>teacher and protector.</i>
<i>Cameron, a Terminator reprogramed</i>
<i>to defend them at all costs.</i>
<i>Derek Reese, John's uncle</i>
<i>and a commanding officer
with the resistance.</i>
<i>Together, they fight to stop Skynet
from ever being created.</i>
<i>The battle for our tomorrow
starts today.</i>
Episode 202: Automatic for the People
<i>v 1.00</i>
http://Projet-SG.net

<i>In the future,
a computer program called Skynet</i>
<i>will declare war on the human race.</i>
<i>Machines have traveled back in time</i>
<i>taking human form
to terminate John Connor,</i>
<i>the future leader of the Resistance.</i>

<i>teacher and protector.</i>

<i>to defend them at all costs.</i>

<i>and a commanding officer
with the Resistance.</i>

from ever being created.</i>

starts today.</i>

<i>déclarera la guerre à l'humanité.</i>

dans le passé</i>

<i>sage et bienveillante.</i>
<i>Cameron, un Terminator reprogrammé</i>
<i>pour les défendre à tout prix.</i>
<i>Derek Reese, l'oncle de John</i>
<i>et officier dans la Résistance.</i>
<i>Ensemble, ils combattent
pour empêcher la création de Skynet.</i>
<i>La guerre pour notre avenir
commence aujourd'hui.</i>

Il vient d'un magasin d'occasions

<i>In the future,
a computer program called Skynet</i>
<i>will declare war on the human race.</i>
<i>Machines have traveled back in time</i>
<i>taking human form
to terminate John Connor,</i>
<i>the future leader of the Resistance.</i>
<i>Sarah Connor, John's mother,</i>
<i>teacher and protector.</i>
<i>Cameron, a Terminator reprogramed</i>
<i>to defend them at all costs.</i>
<i>Derek Reese, John's uncle</i>
<i>and a commanding officer
with the Resistance.</i>
<i>Together, they fight to stop Skynet
from ever being created.</i>
